name: Heka 0.10.0
body:
At long last, the Heka v0.10.0 final release. Contains all of the fixes and new features in the v0.10.0 beta releases, plus an additional LogstreamerInput bug fix for cases where log files of zero length are deleted and recreated out from under the log watcher. Full details in [changelog](https://github.com/mozilla-services/heka/blob/v0.10.0/CHANGES.txt).

name: Heka 0.10.0b2
body:
Third Heka 0.10.0 beta release. Highlights include:
- TcpOutput now supports closing / reopening connections after a configurable number of succesfully delivered messages.
- Added decoders for parsing Linux's "netstat" and "netdev" output (i.e. contents of /proc/net/netstat, /proc/net/snmp, and /proc/net/net/dev files).
- All decoders can now suppress decode failure error messages if desired.
- Many, many bugfixes, including some significant ones related to the newly added disk buffering behaviour.

As always, full details are available in the [changelog](https://github.com/mozilla-services/heka/blob/v0.10.0b2/CHANGES.txt).

name: Heka 0.10.0b0
body:
First beta release of Heka version 0.10.0. This features a complete overhaul of the [filter](http://hekad.readthedocs.org/en/v0.10.0b0/developing/plugin.html#filters) and [output](http://hekad.readthedocs.org/en/v0.10.0b0/developing/plugin.html#outputs) plugin APIs, along with a temporary [transitional API](http://hekad.readthedocs.org/en/v0.10.0b0/developing/old_apis.html#older-apis) for both plugin types to ease the migration process.

The new APIs simplify plugin implementations, and allow Heka to support disk buffering for all filter and output plugins. Details on the many additional features and fixes are available in the [changelog](https://github.com/mozilla-services/heka/blob/v0.10.0b0/CHANGES.txt).

name: Heka 0.9.0
body:
The Heka 0.9.0 release has lots of new fixes and features. And, in the name of progress, there are a handful of breaking changes, so please read the [changelog](https://github.com/mozilla-services/heka/blob/v0.9.0/CHANGES.txt) carefully before you upgrade! Some highlights:
- We've introduced "splitter" plugins, which handle the task of deciding where to slice input streams so as to generate discrete Heka messages.
- The config loading has been improved, so Heka now automatically extracts decoder and splitter settings from an input plugin's configuration and makes them available to the input through an improved API.
- It is now possible to use shared Lua libraries with the Lua sandbox.
- It is also now possible to write input and output plugins using Lua.
- Heka message protocol buffer encoding and decoding is now available within the Lua sandbox.
- ElasticSearch output now supports disk buffering to prevent message loss when ElasticSearch is unavailable.
- Disk buffering for ElasticSearch and TcpOutput now supports a maximum queue size, with the ability to specify what should happen when the maximum size is reached.

Unfortunately a [bug](https://github.com/golang/go/issues/9754) related to linking C and Go code on Windows has made it impossible for us to provide a Windows build for this release. We hope that this will be resolved soon.

name: Heka 0.8.1
body: Bugfix release, see [changelog](https://github.com/mozilla-services/heka/blob/v0.8.1/CHANGES.txt).

name: Heka 0.8.0
body:
Heka 0.8.0 is out, now with moar [Docker](http://www.docker.com)! Some notable new features:
- New encoders for generating JSON data suitable for [InfluxDB](http://influxdb.com) and [Librato](https://metrics.librato.com).
- Included Dockerfiles to generate Heka Docker containers for both development and deployment.
- New DockerLogInput for loading stdout and stderr from all of the Heka host's running containers.
- Greatly improved performance for simple "starts with" and "ends with" regular expression message matchers.
- Support for environment variable substitution into Heka config files.
- Improved stability for AMQPOutput.
- Added Logstreamer journal support for very small (<500 bytes) loaded files.

And [more](https://github.com/mozilla-services/heka/blob/v0.8.0/CHANGES.txt).

name: Heka 0.7.1

name: Heka 0.7.0
body: Added IrcOutput, UdpOutput, improved protobuf decoding and encoding performance thanks to gogoprotobuf, file polling input, decoders and filters for Linux server monitoring, improved real time statsd graphing, "Getting Started" docs, and [more](https://github.com/mozilla-services/heka/blob/v0.7.0/CHANGES.txt).

name: Heka 0.6.0
